aiAnalysis.summary: This README provides a step-by-step guide on how to set up a Python development environment and run a simple 'Hello World' program. It includes instructions for downloading Python, installing Visual Studio Code with the Python extension, creating a Python file, and executing it from the terminal. The guide is augmented with images illustrating the process.

This is a very simple Python script that prints the string 'Hello World' to the console. It serves as a basic example of Python execution and is commonly used as a first program when learning a new language.
